creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: vertical ōban diptych; a (left):  squatting figure wearing a white headscarf and holding a green box with yellow flowers, tied with a red cord, wearing a black kimono with white symbols; b (right):  standing man holding a man and wearing a brown and blue kimono with white symbols, leaning on a bamboo gate with two doors, which separate the figures; bold text in top outer corners and center outer edges; round cartouches with text at center of left sheet and LRQ of right sheet; rectangular cartouches with text in LRQ of each sheet
dimension:
13 3/4 × 9 11/16 in. (34.93 × 24.61 cm) (image, sheet, a, vertical ōban)
13 3/4 × 9 3/4 in. (34.93 × 24.77 cm) (image, sheet, b, vertical ōban)
marks: Signature and Seal Gototei Kunisada ga 五渡亭國貞画 on each sheet
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: The Actors Onoe Eizaburō III as Ōboshi Yuranosuke (R) and Iwai Kumesaburō II as Ōboshi Rikiya (L)
